bibl.title: Egypt and the Hellenistic World. Proceedings of the International Colloquium, Leuven, 24-26 May 1982.
bibl.note: Pp. xxiii-xxvii: Introductory address by E. Van 't Dack; - 437-442: Closing address by Willy Peremans.
bibl.seg: Van 't Dack Edmond, P. Van Dessel and W. Van Gucht (Edd.), Egypt and the Hellenistic World. Proceedings of the International Colloquium, Leuven, 24-26 May 1982. (Studia Hellenistica. 27.)
Lovanii, Studia Hellenistica, 1983, 8°, xxvii-442 pp. et 4 pll.
Pp. xxiii-xxvii: Introductory address by E. Van 't Dack; - 437-442: Closing address by Willy Peremans.
C.R. par Hélène Cuvigny, ChrEg 59 (1984) No. 117, pp. 186-189. - Étienne Bernand, BibO 42 (1985) coll. 328-330.
Van 't Dack Van Dessel Van Gucht Peremans
